reviewText: At first glance, Galactic Bowling appears to be a whimsical casual bowling game with a sci-fi setting that could be a lot of fun. Upon actually playing it, the controls will make you want to throw your entire computer out the window. Whatever I paid for this, years ago, it was too much.
voteText: 17 of 20 people (85%) found this review helpful 5 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Graphics:They are s**t, the characters look blocky and the scenery has moderately-low rendered textures.
3 reasons why this game is pointless to play:1. You can't play on your own WITHOUT an AI character. (If so, this game would've gotten a higher score, and a recommendation)
2. The controls are broken to say the least.
3. You can get a 300 EVERY SINGLE TIME! Due to the fact that the f**king bowling ball bounces off the pins for a dumb minigame, rather than going through them, like they were fricking supposed to!
Final Verdict: 2/10 It only escapes being WORSE because i like bowling games.
voteText: 10 of 12 people (83%) found this review helpful

reviewText: If you wanted to ruin a bowling game, this game is the definition to go by. First you add a horrible story, then horrible controls. With these two throw in changing physics that are mind boggling and maybe a few special abilities that are special in the sense you'd be a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ to use them.\n\nDon't buy this game unless you like to suffer.

reviewText: Пафос и гротеск, шары и кегли, свет и тьма. Со слов ролика существует две планеты - планета света и планета тьмы. Королева планеты тьмы сделала свою дочь королевой планеты света и кукловодит ей. Земля в опасности, победитель останется только один....он спасёт галактику (без вариантов). Кстати, это я про боулинг ещё не упоминал:) Минус - дико неудобное управление ударом и самим прицеливанием, накрутили много лишнего на мой взгляд. Стоить отметить крайне харизматичных соперников. Полстрайка за галактику! 7 из 10 :)
